### PL015 Greenhouse Rehabilitation Project

#### Background

The National Capital Commission (NCC) is seeking services to rehabilitate a heritage greenhouse located on a National Historic Site.

### Intent

The NCC is requesting proposals from qualified service providers to undertake the rehabilitation of the heritage greenhouse, which is a significant cultural and historical landmark in the National Capital Region.

### Enquiries and Clarifications

Prospective bidders should submit written enquiries to Sr. Contract Officer Philippe Lupien via email (philippe.lupien@ncc-ccn.ca) as early as possible within the solicitation period. Enquiries should be received no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the tender closing date to ensure timely responses. Non-compliance with this requirement may result in proposal disqualification.

### Tender Information

*   Tender Reference Number: CB-651-59608523
*   Solicitation Number: PL-015
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-01T15:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-04
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-08-31
*   Regions of Opportunity: Global (World)
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Contact Information:
    *   Philippe Lupien, Sr. Contract Officer
    *   Email: philippe.lupien@ncc-ccn.ca
    *   Phone: (343) 552-5976
    *   Address: 202-40 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON K1P 1C7, Canada

### Tender Submission

Bidders are required to submit their proposals electronically by email to Bids-soumissions@ncc-ccn.ca with the tender file number PL-015 in the subject line.

### Important Notes

*   The procurement process is not subject to trade agreements.
*   The official Government Electronic Tendering Service website is [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).
*   Bidders should download all tender information from the designated website to ensure compliance and avoid disqualification.
